titleStmt.title: A reporte of maister doctor Redmans answeres, to questions propounded him before his death concernynge certaine poyntes of religion, now beyng with many in controuersye. Whervnto diuerse artycles be added, lately subscribed by Master Chedsey.
titleStmt.author: Chedsey, Master.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Raynalde in Paules churche yeard for Wylliam Seres, dwellyng at the west syde of Paules towarde Ludgate, at the signe of the hedge hog],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's and publisher's names from colophon.
Considerable print show-through; some leaves cropped at head.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the west syde of Paules towarde Ludgate, at the signe of the hedge hog]
